title: Is this an answer or a question? - Quora

response.answer_text: In this particular instance, you definitely have a question.  However, it is a common -- and often helpful -- style to answer a question with another question.  This can be humorous, as in the classic Abbott and Costello bit, "who's on first?".  It can also be a very effective tool in interviews, allowing additional time to think of an answer.But you do not appear to be trawling for laughs or playing for time; therefore, you are simply asking a question.

“Is this a question or an answer?” Answer: yes. And also, no. “This” is (in this context) a pronoun. Let’s face it, ‘though, your post ends with a question mark, and answers nothing. It’s a question. But THIS is an answer.
